articles.title: From cold to closed: Advances in DNA analysis helped solve cold cases in 2025
articles.description: MONTREAL — In a Quebec courtroom last October, Sylvie Desjardins delivered a message to her daughter’s killer that was 30 years in the making. “You thought you were taking a life, but in truth, you only added weight to your own existence,” she told killer Réal Courtemanche. “
